subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Football
lead_paragraph: Instead of taking a playmaking receiver or a shutdown cornerback, the Jets grabbed a safety, Calvin Pryor of Louisville, to bolster a secondary that endured a miserable 2013 season.
snippet: Instead of taking a playmaking receiver or a shutdown cornerback, the Jets grabbed a safety, Calvin Pryor of Louisville, to bolster a secondary that endured a miserable 2013 season.
